text: You have the right to obtain from us the restriction of processing where one of the following applies: Bridge Instructors no longer needs the personal data for the purposes of the processing, but they are required by you for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims;

Privacy policy

We use both session and persistent cookies on our website.
This information includes: Cookies and anonymous identifiers We use various technologies to collect and store information when you visit Bridge Instructors, and this may include sending one or more cookies or anonymous identifies to your device.
We may collect information about the Bridge Instructors services that you use and how you use them, such as when you register for a lesson.
We use cookies to allow a user to remain logged in and to personalize the website for each user.

Cookies may be either "persistent" cookies or "session" cookies: a persistent cookie will be stored by a web browser and will remain valid until its set expiry date, unless deleted by the user before the expiry date; a session cookie, on the other hand, will expire at the end of the user session, when the web browser is closed.
Cookies can be used by web servers to identify and track users as they navigate different pages on a website and identify users returning to a website.
